data.message: Yea was, is it because of that weak ass “freestyle”?  Yep. You think that douche freestyled that? He planned that whole shindig and yet he just thought of all those puns on the top of his head? Sure sounded like it. That’s how bad it really was. But that’s not why he’s a fucktard now. I used to love his music. And I still jam to some of his hits. He got bought. He’s a tool. He’s an image for making you dumbasses believe shit that’s not real. Look at the the damn picture for this page. Why the goat horns? Lol. He created hype to get back in the limelight to hopefully sell some records of his upcoming album. Best rapper alive? Next you’ll say little Wayne is on that list too.
